programme.desc: Azam disabitkan atas tuduhan merompak dan menjalani hukuman penjara selama 17 tahun. Ingin memulakan kehidupan baru dengan harapan dapat berdamai semula bersama keluarganya - tetapi bekas isteri dan anaknya menginginkan yang sebaliknya. Kecewa, Azam kembali ke rakan-rakannya dan berkawan dengan Ayub. Namun dia tidak mengetahui bahawa Ayub menyimpan rahsia yang besar daripadanya.

programme.title: Sepi Itu Indah
programme.desc: Liz seorang gadis remaja yang tinggal di Terengganu bersama bapanya Pak Chad, bekas pejuang kemerdekaan berhaluan kiri. Dia bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis terkenal. Selepas kematian Pak Chad, Liz meninggalkan kampung halamannya dan pergi ke rumah Datuk Kamarul, rakan seperjuangan bapanya yang kini sudah berjaya dalam bidang politik dan perniagaan di Petaling Jaya. Datuk Kamarul mempunyai dua orang anak iaitu Zamri dan Zaiton. Liz kemudiannya menjadi anak angkat kepada Datuk Kamarul dan menyambung persekolahannya dalam aliran sastera. Kehadiran Liz dalam keluarga itu telah membuatkan hubungan Zamri dan kekasihnya Ita, menjadi renggang.

programme.title: Sumpah Pocong Lintang Bayu
programme.desc: Lintang, seorang gadis yang sedang hamil bertunang dengan Bayu. Penduduk kampung mula memandang serong kepada mereka berdua. Tertekan dengan perkara itu, Bayu dan Lintang membuat upacara sumpah pocong yang bertujuan untuk menidakkan segala tuduhan. Selepas upacara sumpah dilaksanakan perut Lintang tidak juga surut. Bayu pula diserang penyakit aneh yang membuatkan penduduk kampung semakin cemas dan mendesak agar Bayu dipulaukan.

programme.title: Gadis Hitam Putih
programme.desc: Kota Jakarta telah digemparkan dengan berita kejadian lebih 20 tahun lalu. Dalam satu perbicaraan di mahkamah, seorang jururawat bernama Mira mengaku telah menukar bayi dua keluarga yang mempunyai latar belakang yang berbeza. Mira bertindak sebegitu kerana dia ingin membalas dendam terhadap seorang doktor yang memutuskan cintanya kerana perbezaan darjat keturunan.

programme.title: Potret Maria
programme.desc: Johan yang sudah lama berkahwin dengan Maria kecewa kerana mereka belum mempunyai anak. Dia ditemukan dengan seorang gadis bernama Seri. Dalam pertemuan itu telah timbul perasaan cinta antara mereka. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan itu tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu Seri yang menganggap Johan hanya ingin mempermainkan anaknya. Maria meminta Seri meninggalkan Johan, tetapi tindakan itu telah menyebabkan Johan marah sehingga menimbulkan ketegangan antara mereka.

programme.title: Mimpi Moon
programme.desc: Moonir dan Vina, yang merupakan pasangan kekasih zaman kanak-kanak, bertemu semula di kampung halaman mereka di di sebuah komuniti yang tenang dan kecil yang terletak di Pulau Langkawi. Kasih sayang yang pernah mereka hilangkan kini telah disemarakkan semula.

programme.title: Perempuan Melayu Terakhir
programme.desc: Kehilangan isteri yang meninggal dunia saat melahirkan anak perempuan, Haikal ingin memenuhi hasrat arwah isterinya untuk membesarkan anaknya, Sofia dalam suasana Melayu. Mahu mencari nilai Melayu yang sebenar, Haikal pergi ke Terengganu dan terjumpa Mustika - lalu jatuh cinta. Pelbagai konflik berlaku kerana Mustika merupakan tunangan orang namun Haikal tidak mahu berputus asa demi mendapatkan cinta Mustika.

programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Hope Finds Love Ep6
programme.desc: Hope, sorang penulis muda yang hiper , sering gagal dalam cinta. Namun, jodohnya sentiasa dekat dimata.

programme.title: Debu-Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Cinta Kita
programme.desc: seorang gadis yang keciwa dalam percintaan alu mengubah wataknya menjadi seorang tomboy .Namun dia kembali kepada wanita semula setelah menemui cinta yang baru

programme.title: Mache Fusion
programme.desc: Sejak kecil Mahmud memang meminati bidang masakan dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang Chef yang berjaya suatu hari nanti. Minatnya timbul apabila sering membantu ibunya di dapur dan dia juga membesar dengan masakan-masakan tradisional negeri kelahirannya.

programme.title: Tmo 3 2 1 Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem 3 2 1 Cinta

programme.title: Insan Terpilih
programme.desc: Hidup Firdaus tidak terurus seperti orang lain. Setiap hari dia akan mengeliling kampung mengutip sampah dan mencuci surau malah akan mengutip najis cicak yang berselerak di dalam surau dengan menggunakan tangannya. Katanya, jika dia mengguna penyapu, pahala akan menjadi sedikit. Ustaz Zaki sangat kagum dengan Firdaus walaupun dia begitu tetapi dia rajin mencari pahala dan tidak mengambil kesempatan atas orang lain. Dalam keadaannya sedemikian, ada segelintir anak-anak kampung menggelarnya Firdaus Gila. Malah Firdaus juga sering diganggu oleh Leman, pemuda kampung yang nakal dan menggelarkan Firdaus busuk.

programme.title: Just The Way You Are
programme.desc: Drake terlibat dalam permainan pertaruhan dengan kawan baiknya, iaitu cuba mendapatkan hati Sophia. dan sekiranya sophia sudah jtuh cinta dengan drake, dia harus menceritakan segala-galanya kepada sophia yang semua nya itu Cuma dusta dan taruhan.

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

Suatu hari, ketika ingin menziarahi kakaknya, dia terserempak dengan bekas kekasihnya. Dia melalui beberapa cabaran dan diragui bapa dan kakanya sendiri. Dia sebenarnya menghidap penyakit barah dan tidak akan hidup lama.

programme.title: Aku Belum Mahu Mati
programme.desc: Maria, wanita yang bekerjaya, tidak menitikberatkan soal keagamaan dan agak cenderung mengumpul pelbagai jenis patung walaupun tidak digemari oleh suaminya. Maria merasakan dirinya masih muda dan tidak gemar apabila dinasihati Nora, rakan baiknya, mengenai solat dan pemakaian yang menutup aurat. Bagi Maria, kematian itu masih jauh lagi.

programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep194
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep66
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Aku Menyebutnya Tampan dan Pemberani
programme.desc: Asep berhijrah ke Jakarta dan bertemu Tania, mampukah dia menakluki ibu kota dan hati Tania?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep197
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep68
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep4
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep168
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep198
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Dari Bakmie Jadi You Love Me
programme.desc: Citra, sangat benci disuruh memasak dan bergelut dengan urusan dapur, menurut Citra sebenarnya tidak, dia lebih suka bekerja di syarikat dan memakai pakaian formal yang elegan seperti wanita berkerjaya amnya. Tetapi masalah timbul apabila cinta datang kepada Citra. Ternyata dia bercinta dengan Aditya, masalahnya ibu bapa Aditya berfikiran kolot, yang mana menurut mereka wanita itu bekerja di dapur, bukan di pejabat.

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep20

programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.title: 58th Broadcast Golden Bell Awards(M) Ep1
programme.desc: The 58th Golden Bell Awards is one of the annual events of the Taiwan media industry in 2023 to reward the outstanding Taiwanese radio practitioners in 2023.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep1516
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5657
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep117
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1055
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep20
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep873874
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep692
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep468
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1617
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3393
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47234724
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep191192
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1855
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep11
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3690
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47234724

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep11

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep191192
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep193194
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2099
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep7
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Island of Fire
programme.desc: A cop goes undercover in a prison to find a murderer. When the prison warden enrols him and other inmates for a secret mission, he finally finds the murderer.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome lifes challenges.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: A band of courageous bodyguards is tasked with escorting the daughter of general, the concubine of the recently deceased Ming emperor Wu Sangui, and her son, who is the last hope of the Ming Dynasty, to safety.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Dukes daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mus lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Lis father

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Chas The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Bhajarangi 2
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, starring Shiva Rajkumar, Bhavana Menon, Shruti, Cheluvaraj, Saurav Lokesh & Others

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Santhanam, Shritha Sivadas, Rajendran, T.M. Karthik Srinivasan, Kavitha Ranjini

programme.title: Kalavani 2
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film Starring, Vimal, Oviya

programme.title: Oh My Kadavule
programme.desc: Tamil Fantasy Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, starring Ashok Selvan, Ritika Singh, and Vani Bhojan

programme.title: Veetla Visesham
programme.desc: Tamil comedy drama film, Starring - RJ Balaji, Sathyaraj, Urvashi, Aparna Balamurali, K.P.A.C. Lalitha

programme.title: Kaari
programme.desc: Tamil sports action drama film, Starring - M. Sasikumar, Parvathy Arun, J. D. Chakravarthy & Balaji Sakthivel

programme.title: Yaamirukka Bayamey
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Krishna, Oviya, Rupa, Anaswara Kumar, Karunakaran & Others

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Velan

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must see family comedy from the creators of Daddy's Home.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzis surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: American Skin
programme.desc: Lincoln Jefferson, an Iraqi War veteran, working as a school janitor tries to mend his relationship with his son after a divorce. When his son is killed by a police officer found innocent without standing trial, he takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her holy reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his companys most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Blood Pressure
programme.desc: Nicole, a 41-year-old wife bored with her mundane life, receives letters from a mysterious observer. Enticed, she plays along but they soon get out of hand and threaten to tear apart her relationship with her husband and two teenage children.

programme.title: Seeing Thunder
programme.desc: Seeing Thunder is a documentary that threads on the hidden conundrums in the deaf world. Within the deaf and the hearing world is a fine line so whats it like to live within as an in-betweener?

programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.desc: Architect Laura Brunel is sent to Bangkok to create plans for a mall. She meets Marc, a manager of an NGO that runs orphanages, and falls in love with him. However, she must tell him that her project will involve the destruction of the local orphanage.

programme.title: Baltic Files I - The Body On The Beach
programme.desc: After being transferred to the German-Danish border, Chief Inspector Svenja is tasked with a case involving a body on a beach. With her new colleague Antione, she investigates a case which involves a liquor dealer and a tragedy that goes back decades.

programme.title: Garden Lane
programme.desc: Eric and Elin were both children to drug addict parents and had traumatic childhoods. As adults, they serendipitously meet at a funeral. As they relive the ghosts of their past, they struggle to find strength in one another as they once did as kids.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr play a game of "Put-Pocket" at a grocery store, then get jumpy at the park after taking over each other's cell phones. And tonight's big loser learns that when you gotta goyou gotta go.

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: Syriana: noun a geographical term referring to those Middle East hot spots that have proven volatile with regard to the security of the United States; a place in the Middle East where trouble is always breaking out. Based on the best-selling book See No Evil: The True Story of a Ground Soldier in the CIA's War on Terrorism by Robert Baer, this timely political thriller takes a penetrating look at the efforts of the U.S. intelligence-gathering community in the Middle East, weaving together several storylines ranging from American foreign policy and the CIA's role in it to the oil industry and terrorism. Welcome to Syriana.

programme.title: Friends S9 2
programme.desc: Joey's futile attempts to gain Ross' forgiveness for mistakenly asking Rachel to marry him only result in emergency hospitalization.

programme.title: Friends S9 3
programme.desc: Rachel's constant calls to her baby Emma's pediatrician force him to reject her as a patient.

programme.title: Friends S9 4
programme.desc: Phoebe fears losing her latest prospective boyfriend, Mike, and her self-doubt is only worsened by Ross' foolish comments.

programme.title: Friends S9 5
programme.desc: While Phoebe and Joey wait at a fancy restaurant for their friends' arrival to celebrate Phoebe's birthday, Rachel is delayed because she is afraid to leave her infant with a baby-sitter.

programme.title: Friends S9 6
programme.desc: In the Emmy Award-winning comedy's 200th episode, Ross jealously mocks Rachel's choice of an oversensitive male nanny, Sandy, for Emma.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: This week, Michael stuns shoppers at a thrift mart with a remarkably advanced antique that self-tailors clothes and a chalkboard that solves mathematical equations. And at a hardware store, a DIYer is left questioning the intelligence of beetles that follow blueprints and unscrew nuts and bolts. Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 6
programme.desc: Michael fishes for trouble in a toy store with pop-up books that contain live animals and, at a health food store, he makes a woman's day by showing her how to milk almonds. Later, a mummy causes an employee to question ancient curses.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 7
programme.desc: Michael gets spooky at an antique store with a vintage voodoo doll and, at a costume store, a Dorothy outfit comes complete with a little dog too. Then, at an arcade, the atmosphere turns from fun to freaky for an employee when Michael gets "zapped" from one game to the next.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 8
programme.desc: Filling in as a karate instructor, Michael disrupts the Zen of his student with skills that literally lift him off the ground, and at a toy store, Michael's frog necklace is so fashionably realistic that it has one little girl begging for a new pet. Then at a military outfitting store, Michael and an employee put together a clothing display that puts the "man" in mannequin.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9
programme.desc: Michael works at a camping store where his life-saving s'mores and pop-up coolers stun would-be glampers, and later at a health food store, a child safety pill bottle with built-in invisibility proves too complicated for adults. Then, at variety store, a customer goes off the rails when Michael adjusts the size of a model train.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber Of Fleet Street

programme.title: A Nightmare On Elm Street
programme.desc: Don't fall asleep! Freddy Krueger returns to everyone's nightmares in this contemporary re-imagining of the Wes Craven horror classic. Watchmen's Jackie Earle Haley plays the razor-fingered iconic killer who haunts the dreams of teenagers and kills them in their sleep. As long as they stay awake, they can protect one another ... but once they fall asleep, there is no escape.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Yorkshire - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to see the Owens in the Yorkshire Dales.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep3
programme.desc: Buses - The red double-decker bus is a global icon. They carry millions of passengers every day across the capital, and Gregg Wallace has special access to a bus-building factory in Scarborough, Yorkshire.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wicked Weapons - When it comes to weapons, snakes have some of the best on earth. Steve goes in search of the adder, and sets out to blow our minds by showing us the fastest snake on earth: the diamond rattlesnake.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sharks - Steve uncovers the secrets of sharks, the world's most infamous predators. He heads out into the Atlantic Ocean to dive with blue sharks, a beautiful but deadly species.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Piranha Attack - Mysterious disappearances, brutal attacks, and wounded people leaving trails of blood... Could the piranha, with its razor-sharp teeth, reputation as a true man-eater and ruthless predator, really be responsible?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mel B - Mel B joins Bear in Wales, where they navigate cliffs, cross challenging terrain and tackle a huge descent. Mel also administers unconventional first aid to Bear, after he gets stung by a jellyfish.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Lost Prince - When Mizumus status drops during adolescence, his alpha female mother disowns him. Follow his challenging journey to find a new clan while overcoming the threats of charging hippos, hungry crocodiles, a pack of wild dogs, and a hyena-eating leopard.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hot Springs Pack - Meet a close-knit family of wild dogs who work together to raise pups and hunt enough food to feed the whole pack. While their well-coordinated hunts are successful, the wet season brings challenges when some of the team strikes out on their own.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Heir to the Clan - Spotty, a female hyena cub, is destined to be leader of the Chimbwe clan that lives in the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley. But she has yet to prove herself. Witness her fight to find her place in this savagely competitive family.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Africa's Big Cats - South Africas Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africas big cats.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Savannah Life - The Savannah is a complex web of life, from the plants at the bottom of the food chain to the predators at the top. Stories of life and death have unfolded on these plains for millions of years.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Trials of Olimba - Enter the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Pride Lands - Spend one day and one night in Zambias Luangwa Valley with Africas most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they havent managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Eclipse of the Pride Lands - How close do you want to get to a lion? The staff must get close enough to place radio transmitting collars on them to keep track of the lion population.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Trials of Olimba - Enter the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mini Giants - Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mother's Darlings - Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - The baboon is one of the worlds most successful and dominant primates. Ranging throughout Africa, we explore how these fascinating animals have adapted to thrive in mountains, deserts, along the shores of acidic lakes, and even on the edge of a mighty ocean.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Amazon Monkeys - In a protected forest on the southern edge of Brazils Amazon Rainforest, lives one of the most intelligent and agile monkeys of the New World - the white-whiskered spider monkey. Their long tails are like a 5th limb and they rarely leave the treetops for the forest floor. They are the ambassadors of their forest.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Home Away from Home - Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The More the Merrier - Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing choresall proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isnt all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Capybara's Pond - At the northern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the largest tropical wetlands on Earth, is a small pond that is home to an unusual family of rodents. They are not your typical rats or squirrels - these giants are the size of sheep! And in the middle of the dry season, this group has more than a dozen babies to raise and keep safe. It is a challenge because as big as they are, these gentle giants are on the menu of lots of predators.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the worlds longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ireland - Explore an island surrounded by the mighty Atlantic ocean, subjected to pounding waves and driving rain. From the Cliffs of Moher to the Giants Causeway, this land has been shaped and reshaped by the power of water and violent geological forces.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2022
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2022!

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep7
programme.desc: To Catch A Changeling - After Jim finds the Killahead Bridge has been moved, he must use a horseshoe to find who in Arcadia is a changeling.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep8
programme.desc: Adventures In Trollsitting - Jim finds a Changeling when babysiting for Claire & finally has proof for Trollmarket but can't tell Claire; Meanwhile AAARRRGGHH!! moves in with Toby.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8
programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brians untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep14
programme.desc: Bumbleberry/Leaf's Still Cool - Rocksy discovers that Verry Berry is fascinated with bees, but when Berry innocently cosplays as a bee, she disappears into the hive and doesn't emerge. / After reuniting with an old friend, Leaf goes to great, unsafe lengths to prove that he's still a cool daredevil.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep27
programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
