In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep27
programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep14
programme.desc: Bumbleberry/Leaf's Still Cool - Rocksy discovers that Verry Berry is fascinated with bees, but when Berry innocently cosplays as a bee, she disappears into the hive and doesn't emerge. / After reuniting with an old friend, Leaf goes to great, unsafe lengths to prove that he's still a cool daredevil.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Ruperts Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert and the Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep3
programme.desc: Rupert Builds a Nest - Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert and the Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her twinkle'

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What's Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Olivia Ep17
programme.desc: Olivia's Fashion Show - After attending a disappointing fashion show with Grandma, Olivia designs some fabulous clothes and is determined to put on her own show. Unfortunately, her models (Ian, Francine and Julian) prove to be more difficult to work with than she'd anticipated. It's up to Olivia to think fast and make the fashion show work!

programme.title: Olivia Ep18
programme.desc: Olivia Makes A Video - When Father takes an out-of-town business trip, Olivia doesn't want him to miss a thing. She decides to create a video diary, filming her family and classmates' everyday life, which isn't quite as exciting as she'd hoped. So Olivia adds her own touch to the final presentation: a big song and dance finish. Dad is thrilled.

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of itchyfootitis, so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the condition begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire itchy foot clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep63
programme.desc: Remember Me Not - An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep38
programme.desc: Baa-Baa for Now, New Zealand - When Odlulu enters Fritz as a dog in a sheepherding competition, Fritz uses the Magnet Key to gently guide all the sheep. But when he loses control of the sheep and they spill into Auckland, the Wanderers must find a way to lead the flock back where they belong.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy moon, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep11
programme.desc: Strutter Sitting / Corny-O Chaos - The Strutter siblings hold a yard sale and babysit at the same time. Archibald races for a big prize: a lifetime supply of his favorite cereal.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep11
programme.desc: My Fair Foosa - To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien civilizes a Foosa.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift - Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save a Popped Top - The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off, and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Banana - Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coqus of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Lost Girl in a Canoe - The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep711

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep712
programme.desc: The Pillow Pirate - When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow in Axle City, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime! Using his new Special Mission Modes and the power of addition, can Blaze solve this pillow problem?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks its a snow monster and its scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: The Secret Room / Little Shrimp, Big Problems - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together. // The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.desc: Pups Pit Crew / Pups Fight Fire - Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new super trike. // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular / Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae / Snow Party - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate. // Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning. // Bossy tries to create a snow day party without snow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Mother's Day on the High Seas - It's the Annual Mother's Day Race and Santi is competing with Mami, but Enrique plans to cheat his way to victory.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Arcade Adventure - Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle are at the arcade-and Sparkle's got her eye on an amazing glitter rocket! But, when she doesn't have enough tickets for the rocket, the friends must jump inside different video games and win enough tickets to collect the prize!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular - Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep408
programme.desc: A Tale of Shovel & Pail - Siblings Shovel and Pail can't agree on an ending for their storybook! When they get so upset that they stop talking to each other, it's up to Josh, Blue and YOU to figure out a way to get them to resolve the conflict.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Mother's Day on the High Seas - It's the Annual Mother's Day Race and Santi is competing with Mami, but Enrique plans to cheat his way to victory.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bays famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Night at the Bluseum - It's the night of the big Bluseum opening, and just as Josh unveils Blue's masterpiece, he discovers that it's missing! He must play Blue's Clues to crack this caper and get Blue's painting back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sandcastle Badge - The squirrels learn how to make sandcastles on the beach, and their work turns out to be so impressive that two crabs ask the gang to build them a new home.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep40
programme.desc: The Football Badge - After deciding to play football, Duggee starts the game by kicking the ball to the squirrels - who look at it blankly as they do not know what to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep41
programme.desc: The Puppet Show Badge - The dog and the squirrels arrange a puppet show to tell the story of a great adventure they had.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Irrigation - Uh oh! Glitch accidently uses his size-ray to shrink the Go Jetters and Ubercorn so that they are the size of ants!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Bird Migration: Spain & Africa - In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Stop and Start - Kit and Pup are out and about. Can you see who stops at the traffic lights? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators discover which toy robot will stop moving last.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep18
programme.desc: Blanket - Dee encourages a friend to say 'blanket' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different blankets - a blue blanket, a baby blanket, a woolly blanket and a picnic blanket!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep78
programme.desc: Up Down, Down Up - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive the Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Uppy Downy. They have fun going up down, down up!

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hello, Hello (Eh-Oh!) - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and say "Hello".

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Healing Harmonies - Tiny is poorly but Small thinks that some music might make her feel better. And he's right!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jurassic Pop - A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep58
programme.desc: Finn Fun - How can Logi-Po join in and play with his pet friend Finn the fish in just the same way that Tinpo plays with his hamster Herman?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep42
programme.desc: A Sock Too Far - When Messy and his friends go camping with a robot who can do anything, there is a giant-sized sock accident!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rumbly Tummy - Messy's tummy is rumbling and so is Lofty the giant's! Luckily the gang are hungry to solve this scientific mystery.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Rub-A-Dub Messy - When Messy and friends discover how levers work, farmyard animal bath time commences with a splash!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Splish Splash Splosh - Lofty's giant sneezes go a long way, so Messy and his friends must help to wash OKIDO clean of all the bad germs flying around!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep64
programme.desc: Car Trip - Monty is surprised that his mum doesn't find her job exciting, and wonders if things become dull if you do them every day.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Hair Cut - Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Constable Quack - After their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah & Constable Quack are on the trail of a biscuit burglar.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep2
programme.desc: Ol Wheezy Wobbles - Thomasasks Den and Dart to fixOl'Wheezythe log loader. Individually they fail, but eventuallyThomasrealises that Den and Dart need to work together.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep3
programme.desc: Express Coming Through - It's a big day on Sodor! The Fat Controller's mother, Dowager Hatt, is having a party and she has invited some very important visitors.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Bob Bilby - When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep42
programme.desc: The Birdwatching Badge - The dog is using his trusty binoculars to do some birdwatching and the squirrels want to have a go too, but Roly finds being very quiet is difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep43
programme.desc: The Big Parade Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help out when the leader of the Big Parade hurts his leg.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Be Careful Badge - When Naughty Monkey starts throwing bananas down from his branch, Ethel slips and the squirrels investigate.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada - The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Solar E-Glitch - After watching a solar eclipse, the team head into space to fix the biggest glitch yet!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Korowai Treehouses, Indonesia - The Go Jetters are visiting the Korowai tribe in the rainforest of Papua in Indonesia. The Korowai take them into the forest where they have built a tree house.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Zahra-Rose's Somalian Nafaqo - Zahra-Rose's dish is Somalian nafaqo, made using mashed potato stuffed with boiled egg.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Grizzly Bears - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Sierra Nevada in California, searching for a mother grizzly bear and her cubs.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep14
programme.desc: Dangerous Dancing - When Sandy teases Seaweed saying he is a dangerous dancer, Seaweed panics, thinking he must be growing extra limbs and turning into a squid.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep15
programme.desc: You've Got Mail - The pirates accidentally miss the postal delivery of Captain Captain's favourite magazine Perfectly Pirate and try to trick her into thinking she has already received it.

programme.desc: Mum School - Bluey plays mum to a brood of bouncy balloons, including an irrepressible floater named Greenie. But she soon discovers that mothering is much harder than she imagined.

programme.desc: Urban Forests - Planting Trees to Combat Climate Change - Drought, forest fires and increasingly frequent storms. Climate change is destroying our forests. All over the world, people are looking for ways to keep them from dying out. Yet nature itself knows best what forests need to thrive.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Danylo Filchenko - Between water skiing and war - He is an artist on water and among the best in the world. Ukrainian water skier Danylo Filchenko won a gold medal at the World Games. But when the war began and his hometown of Dnipro was bombed, his life radically changed. Danylo is now much more than an athlete, he is an ambassador of his country and a relentless supporter of his compatriots in their efforts to fend off Russia.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: In the Land of the Perpetrators - Holocaust Survivors in Post-War Germany - May 1945, Germany. The Nazis have been defeated; the concentration camps liberated. But tens of thousands of Holocaust survivors remain in the land of the perpetrators. DW tells the story of their struggle to rebuild their lives - and the present-day campaign to keep their memory alive.

Danylo is now much more than an athlete, he is an ambassador of his country and a relentless supporter of his compatriots in their efforts to fend off Russia.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep904NamajunasvsZhang2
programme.desc: New Yorks Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between Thug Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC272CovingtonvsMasvidal
programme.desc: Former friends and teammates turned bitter rivals, Colby Chaos Covington and Jorge Gamebred Masvidal headlined an action-packed card for UFC 272. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep13
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC253AdesanyavsCosta
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fansa retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2331
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Liqui Moly Motorrad Grand Prix Deutschland Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2331
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Main Event - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten for over seven years, Grant Dawsons hot streak has led him a UFC Fight Night main event on October 8 that will shake up the lightweight Top 10 as he faces surging veteran Bobby Green at the APEX in Las Vegas. Showing the best form of his career in his July finish of former champion Tony Ferguson, Green is determined to stop the rapid rise of Dawson and continue his own march to the top at 155 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
